column5: ....Just a heads up for those who may be looking for a floater coat.  Nautilus Floater Coat
Thanks, one of these days I'll ge one of those....there are days when the whole suit is just not needed....  Good deal though...
lol  just circled it and put the flyer by the wifes loung chair, funny you point this out!
Thanks for the heads up. I just picked one up at CTC.  There still a M,and 2 XL's left at the location in Oak Ridges.  Cheers!!!
